description: Try our easy to follow Portobello Mushrooms With Garlic Aioli recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Portobello Mushrooms With Garlic Aioli Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a large baking tray with foil and place a wire rack on top. Combine breadcrumbs, dukkah and flour in a bowl. Whisk eggs in a separate bowl. Slice mushrooms 2cm thick.

Dip each mushroom slice into egg then coat with breadcrumb mixture, pressing on firmly. Lay onto wire rack. Spray well with oil. Bake for 10 minutes. Turn mushrooms over and spray again with oil. Cook for a further 10 minutes or until golden.
Serve immediately with aioli for dipping.
